question: National e-Governance Division (NeGD) has signed a MoU with Common Service Centre, for delivery of the services of which application?
explanation:
A MoU has been signed between the National e-Governance Division (NeGD) and CSC e-Governance Services India. The objective of this association is to make available the UMANG app services to citizens through 3.75 lakh Common Service Centres (CSCs) across the country.
The UMANG stands for “Unified Mobile Application for New-age Governance”. The app is a single platform for the citizens to access e governance services ranging of central, state and local government bodies.
